item.title: Hack The Box: Mentor Writeup | Medium
item.description: Hack The Box: Mentor Writeup Welcome to my detailed writeup of the medium difficulty machine “Mentor” on Hack The Box. This writeup will cover the steps taken to achieve initial foothold and escalation to root. TCP Enumeration $ rustscan -a 10.129.228.102 --ulimit 5000 -g 10.129.228.102 -> [22,80] $ nmap -p22,80 -sCV 10.129.228.102 -oN allPorts Starting Nmap 7.94SVN ( https://nmap.org ) at 2024-08-01 22:30 CEST Nmap scan report for 10.129.228.102 Host is up (0.
